name: Kathmandu
about: On the way we will stopover for sightseeing of Bhaktapur Durbar square. After reaching at Nagarkot hotel you can enjoy panoramic view of mountains and hills. In the evening you can enjoy sunset from the hotel. Nagarkot: Nagarkot is isolated place and the favorite one for the peace and nature lover. Nagarkot is very famous for Sunrise, Sunset, and Mountain View along with amazing landscape of hills.

name: Saint Martins Island
about: After Breakfast, Start journey to Chhera Dwip. Spend some times there, enjoy the living corals and small fishes swimming. After lunch leave St. Martin and start for Teknaf by sea truck. Start for Dhaka by Night Coach. Overnight Journey. Reach Dhaka at Morning.

name: Bandarban
about: Leave Rangamati for Bandarban at 07. 30 hrs.(In side road, 03.30 hrs. journey).After arrive Journey start for visit- Chimbuk top hill & back way enjoy Shailo Propat, Nilachal then evening visit Golden Temple. Meghla by Jeep. On Over-night at Bandarban.
